text: [Laughter]
hey guys hey guys somebody turned on the
TV
hello now we got one too I'm gonna have
to lift you
you gotta get there alone
[Music]
in the past you have all put your own
interests above others and then lied to
yourselves and deceived the world about
your callousness your velocity your
criminality now you will look in the
mirror and turn your face who you really
are the choices you have made may cost
you your life you cannot escape the
truth there is however one person who
can help you if he close the lever
before you're buried alive you will live
you
[Music]
